Package com.fhkiel.oopproject.rest

Class CharacterController

java.lang.Object
com.fhkiel.oopproject.rest.CharacterController
@RestController public class CharacterController extends Object
Class-Description:
Spring rest controller providing URLs for CRUD operations on the character container.

  • Method Details

    • addCharacter

      @PostMapping(path="/character", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public void addCharacter​(@RequestBody Character c)
      Adds the transmitted character to the CharacterContainer.
      Parameters:
      c - json object Example: { "@type": "LotR", "firstname": "Lukas", "lastname": "Klink", "age": 20, "favoriteTobacco": "Halfling's Leaf" } { "@type": "StarWars", "firstname": "Klaas", "lastname": "Pelzer", "age": 20, "spaceship": "Flying Hwak2" } at "@type" you choose character class, "StarWars" or "LotR"

    • getCharacters

      @GetMapping("/character") public List<Character> getCharacters()
      Gives all characters from the CharacterContainer.
      Returns:
      json object with all characters

    • getCharacter

      @GetMapping("/character/{id}") public Character getCharacter​(@PathVariable UUID id)
      TODO: *here is something you might need to correct*c Gets a specific character by its id from the CharacterContainer.
      Parameters:
      id - id of wanted char Type: UUID
      Returns:
      character in json

    • updateCharacter

      @PutMapping("/character") public void updateCharacter​(@RequestBody Character c)
      Updates a specific character in the CharacterContainer.
      Parameters:
      c - json object with id and attributes, Example: { "@type": "StarWars", "id": "c1aaa023-a735-4b1f-9b9f-895e2c970dc8", "firstname": "Klaas", "lastname": "Pelzer1", "age": 21, "spaceship": "Flying Hwak2" }

    • searchCharacters

      @GetMapping("/character/search") public List<Character> searchCharacters​(@RequestParam String term)
      Searches for characters by their last- and/or firstnames in the CharacterContainer.
      Parameters:
      term - search Substring Type: String
      Returns:
      json array with all characters containing the substring in their first- and/or lastname

    • deleteCharacter

      @DeleteMapping("character/{id}") public void deleteCharacter​(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Deletes a character from container by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - id for char to delete Type: UUID
